评论详情: I’m 5”1 and the shirt covers my whole butt which is annoying. I ordered a size medium and felt like a large. I recommend sizing down your normal size. I love the design and material of it.

If you’re into Y2K fashion, this oversized t-shirt delivers on the trend with its relaxed fit and bold graphic design. Made from cotton, it feels soft and breathable, making it perfect for summer or layering under jackets during cooler months.
This shirt is fashionable and quite appropriate for colder weather despite being short sleeved because it's made of a thicker material than a regular tee.
